auth.loginMessage: Please enter your credentials to access this section
auth.networkError: Network error. Please try again later.

info.adminPanel: Admin Panel: Used to control user accounts, system settings, and monitor the system.
info.downloads: Downloads: The core system for users to access and manage downloads. Note: Setup in the Admin Panel must be completed first.
info.cognitahz: Cognitahz: A proprietary platform for users to consume their downloaded content, combining the best features from various platforms.
info.backups: Backups: Create backup tasks to different services you own or fetch files to your local machine.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn the basics of Katomart and get up and running quickly

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Katomart is a comprehensive platform that combines administration, content scraping, intelligent processing, and backup capabilities in one unified system.

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.step1: Access the Admin Panel to configure your system settings and user accounts
quickStart.step2: Set up your scrapers to collect content from various sources
quickStart.step3: Use Cognitahz to intelligently process and consume your content
quickStart.step4: Configure backup tasks to secure your data

systemRequirements.title: System Requirements
systemRequirements.requirement1: Modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
